class_notes: BSHES students only; S/U grading basis only.
course_description: This course introduces the thesis as a unique scholarly contribution to public health research, practice, and instruction. Organized as a directed study with the thesis chair, the course provides students with the knowledge and skills to develop and refine research questions, conduct a review and analysis of the public health knowledge base, select a theory or organizing framework, formulate a plan for data collection and an IRB application, and draft the initial three chapters of their project.
sections: Class Nbr: 4520, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Comeau, Status: Open
